title: Commands to refresh the POS
text: Type list in the shop assistant field to get the overview or: 999 + 70223010 (pw) – Shuts down the POS program reload – Refreshes the POS program, if you have made changes and don't want to wait for them to take effect (doesn't work for the creation of new shop assistants. You have to wait about 10 minutes for them to turn up) restart – to restart the POS program 333 – Minimizes the POS program restartpc – restarts PC start dddadmin – installes DdD Admin on a new POS (is only used on completely new installations) list – shows this list of shortcuts changepull – A slightly more advanced way of updating the POS than reload. Take longer to load. changepullhash / changeall – takes a lot longer to load. May not be used on e.g. CBR or other bigger customers. 998 – Test login for the POS export + receiptnumber – sends receipts to BO again, if they haven't gone through maintainPOS.exe – updates POS to the latest version updatechart – updates the chart, if there's a problem with the turnover numbers
description:
Type list in the shop assistant field to get the overview or: 

  

999 + 70223010 (pw) – Shuts down the POS program 

  

reload – Refreshes the POS program, if you have made changes and don't want to wait for them to take effect (doesn't work for the creation of new shop assistants. You have to wait about 10 minutes for them to turn up) 

  

restart – to restart the POS program 

  

333 – Minimizes the POS program 

  

restartpc – restarts PC 

  

start dddadmin – installes DdD Admin on a new POS (is only used on completely new installations) 

  

list – shows this list of shortcuts 

  

changepull – A slightly more advanced way of updating the POS than reload. Take longer to load. 

  

changepullhash / changeall – takes a lot longer to load. May not be used on e.g. CBR or other bigger customers. 

  

998 – Test login for the POS 

  

export + receiptnumber – sends receipts to BO again, if they haven't gone through 

  

maintainPOS.exe – updates POS to the latest version 

  

updatechart – updates the chart, if there's a problem with the turnover numbers

title: Double amount - remove manual expense on the POS
text: If the customer has take cash from the register and created a note on it, but has accidentally created this twice, the amount can be annulled by creating another note, where the amount is entered with a minus (you have to use the minus key on the keyabord, not from the virtual keyboard). This does mean that there are 3 notes for the same amount, but two cancle each other out. The note cannot be removed from the system.
description:
If the customer has take cash from the register and created a note on it, but has accidentally created this twice, the amount can be annulled by creating another note, where the amount is entered with a minus (you have to use the minus key on the keyabord, not from the virtual keyboard). 

  

This does mean that there are 3 notes for the same amount, but two cancle each other out. 

  

The note cannot be removed from the system.

title: Item transfer - can't find shop to transfer to
text: 1. If the client can't find a shop in the list for item transfer, check in Backoffice Support Tools. 2. Make sure that their id starts with the same first three numbers. If they don't, the shop they are trying to transfer to is probably in another group, and therefore they can't transfere. 3. Find the client, then check Return to Group-setup to check if the store is in that group. 4. If it is, then it has probably not been added to the list. 5. Return to POS and log in 6. Choose Screen-with-Wrench button 7. Choose store, choose machine, click Change this machine only 8. Click Store transfer / Umlagerung / Vareflytning 9. Find the missing store under Available 10. Click the double arrow key going right and move it into the Selected box 11. Click Save 12. Click Close 13. Click Cancel sale 14. Type reload in the sales assistant field and click the green button 15. Wait for the clock to start running again and log in and retry the item transfer.

title: Morning amount - not correct
text: Repeat the morning amount. The system will overwrite with the latest version. (This is ONLY possible if there have been no sales after the morning amount was entered wrongly). The alternative is to do nothing and add a note on the evening cash balance receipt that the morning amount was wrong.
description:
Repeat the morning amount. The system will overwrite with the latest version. (This is ONLY possible if there have been no sales after the morning amount was entered wrongly). 

  

The alternative is to do nothing and add a note on the evening cash balance receipt that the morning amount was wrong.

title: Offline – can POS be used offline? Can the customer pay?
text: Can a POS run offline? They can run offline with cash payment and for some credit cards, but not all credit cards support offline sales e.g. Mastercard/Visa Debt/Visa Electron and all foreign card. Only danish Visa/Dancards will work offline.
description:
Can a POS run offline? 

  

They can run offline with cash payment and for some credit cards, but not all credit cards support offline sales e.g. Mastercard/Visa Debt/Visa Electron and all foreign card. 

  

Only danish Visa/Dancards will work offline.

title: Report - can't find after making a return etc.
text: If the shop assistant has made a return, clicked on print and the print creates an error and can't open, or they accidentally close it before they've printed/saved it, the reason could be that they click on it too quickly. From the moment it turns up in the print collumen, they should wait 10-15 seconds before clicking it. They cannot recreate the printout, but they can find it again in c:/POS/Reports. They can also create an overview of which items have been returned on any given day by ordering a transaction report for that specific day. See Print – Order Transaction Report English Deutsch Dansk
description:
If the shop assistant has made a return, clicked on print and the print creates an error and can't open, or they accidentally close it before they've printed/saved it, the reason could be that they click on it too quickly. 

  

From the moment it turns up in the print collumen, they should wait 10-15 seconds before clicking it. They cannot recreate the printout, but they can find it again in c:/POS/Reports. 

  

They can also create an overview of which items have been returned on any given day by ordering a transaction report for that specific day. See Print – Order Transaction Report

title: Sale - cancel - Wrong amount/wrong item – before sale is finished
text: If the sales assistant has accidentally added the wrong amount/wrong item and has already clicked the Go To Sale button, they can either reset this by clicking on the Go To Sale button again to return to the previous screen, or - if this does no work - we can shut down the POS and restart again (with Ctrl-Alt-Delete). The sale will not be registered and they can now repeat it with the right amount/item.
description:
If the sales assistant has accidentally added the wrong amount/wrong item and has already clicked the Go To Sale button, they can either reset this by clicking on the Go To Sale button again to return to the previous screen, or - if this does no work - we can shut down the POS and restart again (with Ctrl-Alt-Delete). 

  

The sale will not be registered and they can now repeat it with the right amount/item.

title: Shoppingcenter Card – used by mistake
text: (issued by the shopping center the shop belongs to) The customer has used a shoppingcenter card to pay with by mistake, and wants the amount returned to the card. The sale can be reversed by doing a return. The amount will not be returned to the shoppingcenter card automatically, though. The shop has to contact the issuer of the shoppingcenter card to annul this.
description:
(issued by the shopping center the shop belongs to) 

  

The customer has used a shoppingcenter card to pay with by mistake,  and wants the amount returned to the card. 

  

The sale can be reversed by doing a return. The amount will not be returned to the shoppingcenter card automatically, though. 

  

The shop has to contact the issuer of the shoppingcenter card to annul this.

title: Barcode scanner cannot scan all items in the shop.
text: Sometime the stores contact us that they are unable to scan certain items and sometime,it is scanned when they try 3 or 4 times. The clerk thinks that the problem lies in the barcode scanner. We can check the status of barcode scanner by opening a notepad file and ask the clerk to scan an item. You will observe that the barcode values will be shown in the notepad file and it means that the scanner is totally functional. The important point here is that the problem does not lie in the barcode scanner but it lies with the receipt being printed out from the receipt printer. You can ask the clerk to send a copy of the receipt and look it closely to judge if there are any lines/information missing in the receipt. I have shared a screenshot below where the customer urged that they are unable to scan an item and asked for a new barcode scanner.Actually the marked red signs shows that the lines are not perfect and the barcode scanner cannot read the whole information and therefore the receipt is not scanned. In such case,ask the shop that they need to clean their receipt printer and if it did not resolve the problem then they have to switch/buy a new receipt printer and thus the problem will be resolved.
description:
Sometime the stores contact us that they are unable to scan certain items and sometime,it is scanned when they try 3 or 4 times.

The clerk thinks that the problem lies in the barcode scanner.

We can check the status of barcode scanner by opening a notepad file and ask the clerk to scan an item.

You will observe that the barcode values will be shown in the notepad file and it means that the scanner is totally functional.

The important point here is that the problem does not lie in the barcode scanner but it lies with the receipt being printed out from the receipt printer.

You can ask the clerk to send a copy of the receipt and look it closely to judge if there are any lines/information missing in the receipt.

I have shared a screenshot below where the customer urged that they are unable to scan an item and asked for a new barcode scanner.Actually the marked red signs shows that the lines are not perfect and the barcode scanner cannot read the whole information and therefore the receipt is not scanned.

In such case,ask the shop that they need to clean their receipt printer and if it did not resolve the problem then they have to switch/buy a new receipt printer and thus the problem will be resolved.

title: Main screen or customer screen black(PC is running)
text: This issus is mostly seen on older POS, and can sometimes befixed by rebooting, but some times it will be necessary to reinstall the screens. Here is how to do that: Since its just the screen itself that is not displaying windows, it means windows is still running and you can access the pc via teamviewer without any issues Go to device manager. find the displays Uninstall the screens by right clicking on them and clicking uninstall device. When this is done, reboot the PC, and hopefully the screens will run as intended.
description:
This issus is mostly seen on older POS, and can sometimes befixed by rebooting, but some times it will be necessary to reinstall the screens. Here is how to do that: 


Since its just the screen itself that is not displaying windows, it means windows is still running and you can access the pc via teamviewer without any issues


Go to device manager. 


find the displays



Uninstall the screens by right clicking on them and clicking uninstall device. 


When this is done, reboot the PC, and hopefully the screens will run as intended.

title: "Offline not possible"
text: If you get the message that "offline is not possible" when choosing terminal as method of payment it usually means that the POS does not have connection to the internet. In this case only some credit cards will work, not debit. The message can also be an indicator that the service provider (Nets, Veriphone, etc. ) are having server related issues. Lastly this message can also appear if the usb connection of the cardterminal is loose. Try securing the cable and do a reboot of the card terminal by holding the yellow button "clear", and comma button for a few seconds.
description:
If you get the message that "offline is not possible" when choosing terminal as method of payment it usually means that the POS does not have connection to the internet. 


In this case only some credit cards will work, not debit. 



The message can also be an indicator that the service provider (Nets, Veriphone, etc. ) are having server related issues. 



Lastly this message can also appear if the usb connection of the cardterminal is loose. Try securing the cable and do a reboot of the card terminal by holding  the yellow button "clear", and comma button for a few seconds.

title: Adv. Configuration
text: A Field name Explanation AlwaysPrintSignatureReceiptIfItemIsReturned Default = 1 If there is at least one return line on the receipt, a signature receipt is printed. 0=only signature receipt if negative total 1=signature receipt if min. one negative line. AskForCustomerInfo 0 = Default Collecting information to external CRM system. Data can be downloaded from peoplecollector.dddadmin.com 0 = don’t ask for customer information 1 = ask for costumer information AskForForeginGiftCertificateInfo 0 = Default When redeeming old gift vouchers, you can state the number of the old gift voucher. There will be a file in the POS folder called ForeighnGift.txt containing date,number,amount. title: Machine information - Hardware information
text: If a machine is not running properly, you can see all hardware information here. Connect to the tool at Machineinfo. Use your Support tool password. You can filter in all rows by typing in the input field over the row. Use % as a joker sign before and after the text. You can group by a column by dragging the column-header to the top. After grouping, you can expand.
description:
If a machine is not running properly, you can see all hardware information here.


Connect to the tool at Machineinfo.
Use your Support tool password.
You can filter in all rows by typing in the input field over the row. Use % as a joker sign before and after the text.



You can group by a column by dragging the column-header to the top. After grouping, you can expand.

title: Error while retrieving reports-RIAB
text: In RIAB,reports can be ordered in the menu called reports as shown in the below screenshot. When a report is ordered,it should appear in the print out in a couple of seconds. Sometime,there are errors and reports are not generated. In such case,restarting the POS can sometime resolve the problem. If the error is related to bad communication between servers(web server is not communicating with FTP server) so the customer will receive the following error. In such case,a ticket must be created for the development team so they can work on it. Please note that the drift team must have information,which server the POS is communicating. This information can be found on the main interface of the POS as shown below. In the below case,the webserver is 13 and drift must have this information.
description:
In RIAB,reports can be ordered in the menu  called reports as shown in the below screenshot.
When a report is ordered,it should appear in the print out in a couple of seconds.
Sometime,there are errors and reports are not generated.
In such case,restarting the POS can sometime resolve the problem.


If the error is related to bad communication between servers(web server is not communicating with FTP server) so the customer will receive the following error.
In such case,a ticket must be created for the development team so they can work on it.



Please note that the drift team must have information,which server the POS is communicating.
This information can be found on the main interface of the POS as shown below.
In the below case,the webserver is 13 and drift must have this information.

title: New store is not visible for item transfer.
text: When a new store in a group is correctly configured for item transfers in DdD Admin but still doesn't appear on the POS system for other stores to transfer items, a common solution is to verify the shop number in the Support Tools. A helpful tip is to check if the new store is assigned the correct shop number. If not, assign the appropriate store number. Once the correct number is assigned, it's crucial to restart all POS systems in the other stores for the changes to take effect. I have shared an example,where everything is setup correctly but the stores were unable to track the store during item tranfer.After assigning the correct shop number and making a restart on all other POS's in question resolved the problem and thus the store could choose the transfer items to the new opened store. DdD Support Tools:
description:
When a new store in a group is correctly configured for item transfers in DdD Admin but still doesn't appear on the POS system for other stores to transfer items, a common solution is to verify the shop number in the Support Tools.

A helpful tip is to check if the new store is assigned the correct shop number. If not, assign the appropriate store number. Once the correct number is assigned, it's crucial to restart all POS systems in the other stores for the changes to take effect.

I have shared an example,where everything is setup correctly but the stores were unable to track the store during item tranfer.After assigning the correct shop number and making a restart on all other POS's in question resolved the problem and thus the store could choose the transfer items to the new opened store.


DdD Support Tools:

title: Missing button for promotional labels on POS
text: The customer can contact us that they are missing the menu on POS for printer different kinds of labels. To activate the menu,go to client DdD admin and set SHOWITEMMANAGEMENT from 0 to 1. Make a reload on POS and the menu should be available. Both screenshots are shared below. Screenshot before activating menu. Screenshot after activating menu.
description:
The customer can contact us that they are missing the menu on POS for printer different kinds of labels. 

To activate the menu,go to client DdD admin and set SHOWITEMMANAGEMENT from 0 to 1.



Make a reload on POS and the menu should be available.

Both screenshots are shared below.

Screenshot before activating menu.




Screenshot after activating menu.

title: Display of items color and size on POS
text: The customer may contact us that when they search an item on POS,they cannot see full information about the product like the size or colour as shown in the below screenshot. To activate the different variant parametres,Login to client DdD admin and search for search information(2) in menu Functions mm(1). Move the colour and size above the bold line,Click on save button and then make a reload on POS. The item will now be visible with colour and size information.
description:
The customer may contact us that when they search an item on POS,they cannot see full information about the product like the size or colour as shown in the below screenshot.



To activate the different variant parametres,Login to client DdD admin and search for search information(2)
in menu Functions mm(1).

Move the colour and size above the bold line,Click on save button and then make a reload on POS.
The item will now be visible with colour and size information.

title: Adobe error when starting the POS program
text: When the POS shows the following error... "RdrServicesUpdater2_x86.exe has stopped working" ...you can ask the customer if it is ok with them to stop the POS program using Adobe Acrobate Reader to view printouts and to change it to the internal DdD PDF Viewer instead. If they agree, you can change the parameter "UseOwnPDFViewer" in DdD Admin from 0 to 1.
description:
When the POS shows the following error...

"RdrServicesUpdater2_x86.exe has stopped working"


...you can ask the customer if it is ok with them to stop the POS program using Adobe Acrobate Reader to view printouts and to change it to the internal DdD PDF Viewer instead. If they agree, you can change the parameter "UseOwnPDFViewer" in DdD Admin from 0 to 1.

title: "Read Certificate faild Karten Leser für lesen Certificate nicht gefunden"
text: All POS from Austria have an adapter with a Fiskaly card that is connected via USB to the POS. If this is not the case or if the cable or card is not plugged in correctly, an error message appears: The solution is to simply connect the Fiskaly Adapter to the POS.
description:

The solution is to simply connect the Fiskaly Adapter to the POS.
